snippet: The Federal Hockey League, which added three teams for its second season, is attempting to succeed in the Northeast where several minor leagues have failed.
abstract: Federal Hockey League, which added three teams for its second season, is attempting to succeed in the Northeast where several minor leagues have failed.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Hockey League, which added three teams for its second season, is attempting to succeed in the Northeast where several minor leagues have failed.

headline.seo: Far from N.H.L., Federal Hockey League Soldiers On
headline.main: Far From the N.H.L., a League That Survived Hopes to Grow
